sense.def:
Z izrazom
mutually
opisujemo položaj, v katerem so medsebojna čustva dveh ali več ljudi enaka.

seg.quote: He enjoyed a mutually respectful relationship with them.

sense.def:
Kadar sta dve stvari
mutually exclusive
ali
mutually contradictory
, ne moreta biti obe res ali obe obstajati skupaj.

cit.quote: medsebojno izključujoč; v protislovju drug z drugim

seg.quote: The principles on which it is based are mutually contradictory.
